1.0.10.title: Deezer FLAC, Search History, Session Export, Music Wrapped & Health Monitoring
features: Deezer FLAC lossless audio quality as default playback source
Autocomplete now returns Deezer tracks with smart fallback to YouTube
Quality display in player embed - shows audio quality for each source
Search history tracking - automatically saves all /play searches (up to 100 per user)
Search history commands - view, replay, search, export to playlist, and clear
Session queue export - save entire listening session (history + queue) as playlist
Smart like/unlike detection - like button checks if track is already liked
Unlike confirmation prompt when trying to like an already-liked track
Personal music wrapped - view your listening stats with /wrapped me
Top tracks, top artists, listening patterns, and streak tracking
Server-wide wrapped statistics with /wrapped server
Activity levels and achievements based on listening history
Comprehensive health monitoring system with real-time metrics
Admin health commands - status, metrics, errors, and reset
System performance tracking: memory, CPU, event loop lag
Lavalink connection monitoring and latency tracking
Command success rate tracking and error aggregation
Enhanced logging with automatic log rotation (10MB, 5 files)
Structured JSON logs option for machine parsing
Performance metrics logging with metric() function
Detailed stats command with top sources and activity hours
fixes: Fixed Lavalink startup issues with plugin compatibility
Fixed playback errors for valid Deezer searches
Better health status detection for system issues
changes: Playback now prioritizes Deezer for higher quality audio
Queue command now has subcommands: view and export
History stored per-user with server filtering option
Improved search and playback reliability
Updated plugin configuration for better compatibility
User stats now track per-user: tracks, artists, sources, listening time
Stats store expanded with daily/monthly activity tracking
Health monitoring auto-starts on bot initialization
Logs automatically rotate when reaching size limit
New environment variables: LOG_LEVEL, JSON_LOGS
Error logs now automatically record in health monitoring
Track play/fail/skip events recorded for health metrics

1.0.9.title: Complete Playlist System
features: Full playlist management system - create, edit, share, and play custom playlists
User playlists (personal) and server playlists (shared with everyone)
Liked Songs playlist with quick-add via /like command and player button
Share playlists with 8-character codes or directly with specific users
Collaborative playlists - allow others to add/remove tracks
Import playlists from Spotify and YouTube URLs
Playlist pagination for easy browsing
Track search with autocomplete when adding to playlists
13 playlist commands for complete management
fixes: Playlist view now updates in place instead of sending multiple messages
Like button repositioned for better accessibility
changes: Share codes expire after 24 hours
DJ mode integration - DJs control server playlists when DJ mode is active
Protected Liked Songs playlist cannot be deleted or renamed

1.0.8.title: Live Autocomplete for Play Command
features: Live autocomplete search - get instant song suggestions as you type
Smart deduplication for cleaner results
Fast and responsive search experience

1.0.7.title: Deezer Integration for Enhanced Autoplay
features: Deezer recommendations for better autoplay quality
Improved genre consistency and track discovery
Faster and more reliable recommendations
changes: Spotify credentials now optional

1.0.6.title: SeekTo & Previous Button Fixes
fixes: Fixed seekTo command rejecting flexible timestamp formats
Fixed previous button not updating track info correctly
changes: SeekTo now accepts multiple formats: seconds, MM:SS, or H:MM:SS

1.0.5.title: Version Announcements & Patch Notes System
features: Automatic version announcements for new updates
/changelog command to view patch notes with navigation
/setup announcements to configure announcement preferences
Bot status now shows current version
Interactive navigation between versions

1.0.4.title: Stability & Smart Autoplay Update
features: 24/7 radio mode - continuous playback like a radio station
Smart artist diversity with vibe matching
Automatic reconnection when Discord changes voice servers
Enhanced autoplay with genre, tempo, and energy awareness
fixes: Fixed EQ panel not updating correctly
Fixed bot disconnecting on voice region changes
changes: Better autoplay algorithm with smarter scoring
Faster EQ panel updates

1.0.3.title: Enhanced Autoplay & EQ Improvements
features: Tempo consistency in autoplay for natural flow
Time-of-day awareness - adjusts music energy
Mood and energy progression tracking
Interactive 15-band EQ mixer with A/B comparison
Custom EQ presets (up to 10 per user)
Real-time visual feedback in EQ panel
fixes: Fixed EQ panel errors and positioning issues
changes: Better autoplay with audio feature analysis
EQ panel auto-cleanup after inactivity
Skip learning avoids unwanted genres

1.0.2.title: DJ Mode & Statistics Update
features: DJ mode with role-based permissions and approvals
Skip voting system with multiple modes
Statistics tracking via /stats command
Tracks listening hours, users, and activity patterns
fixes: Fixed duplicate messages on Raspberry Pi

1.0.1.title: Autoplay & Lyrics Update
features: Smart autoplay with genre awareness
Lyrics lookup with /lyrics command
Interactive queue management
Track removal by position or keyword
changes: Better recommendations from multiple sources
Automatic filtering of non-music content

1.0.0.title: Initial Release
features: Complete music playback system
Slash command interface
YouTube and Spotify support
Queue management with shuffle and loop
Volume control and seek
Previous track navigation
Persistent state across restarts
Interactive help command
